title: Ion AmpliSeq Library Prep 3/4: Ligate Adapters
author: Opentrons
description:
Links:
 Part 1: DNA Target Amplification
 Part 2: Partially Digest Amplicons
 Part 3: Ligate Adapters
 Part 4: Library Purification

You will need:
 P10 Multi-channel Pipette
 Aluminum Block Set
 Twin.tec skirted PCR Plates
 Neptune 10 uL Filter Tips
process:
Input the number of samples you are processing. (MAX=24)
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support article.
Hit "Run".
If number of samples is less than 3, robot will create PCR mix in the appropriate wells in the PCR plate. If greater than 3, robot will create a master mix in an Eppendorf tube before distributing its content to the PCR wells.
Robot will transfer Switch Solution from the 2 mL tube rack to PCR plate.
Robot will transfer IonCode Adapters from the PCR tube rack to PCR plate.
Robot will transfer DNA ligase from the 2 mL tube rack to PCR plate.
notes:
Twin.tec skirted PCR Plate (Reagent Plate in slot 1):
 Switch Solution: column 1
 DNA Ligase: column 2

Aluminum 96-well PCR Block:
 * IonCode Adapters Plate

4-in-1 2-mL Tube Rack (Sample Rack):
* Sample order: A1, B1, C1, D1, A2, B2...

If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact protocols@opentrons.com.

You will need:

markdown.process:
1. Input the number of samples you are processing. (MAX=24)
2. Download your protocol.
3. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
4. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
5. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support article](https://support.opentrons.com/ot-2/getting-started-software-setup/deck-calibration).
6. Hit "Run".
7. If number of samples is less than 3, robot will create PCR mix in the appropriate wells in the PCR plate. If greater than 3, robot will create a master mix in an Eppendorf tube before distributing its content to the PCR wells.
8. Robot will transfer Switch Solution from the 2 mL tube rack to PCR plate.
9. Robot will transfer IonCode Adapters from the PCR tube rack to PCR plate.
10. Robot will transfer DNA ligase from the 2 mL tube rack to PCR plate.

Twin.tec skirted PCR Plate (Reagent Plate in slot 1):
* Switch Solution: column 1
* DNA Ligase: column 2

---
 Aluminum 96-well PCR Block:
